paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant Val122Ile, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.phenotype: cardiac involvement in about 80% of cases

functional_data.summary: The most common variant worldwide of TTRv with cardiac phenotype is the Val122Ile.

variants.additional_notes: The penetrance of the Val122Ile variant is not well defined.
key_quotes: The most common variant worldwide of TTRv with cardiac phenotype is the Val122Ile, which occurs in 3–4% of blacks American, with unknown phenotypic penetrance.

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in the TTR gene was identified in the text.
